metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7543 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Bash before 4.4 allows local users to execute arbitrary commands with rootprivileges via crafted SHELLOPTS and PS4 environment variables.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7543` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bash - 4.3-14ubuntu1.2
bash-builtins - 4.3-14ubuntu1.2
bash-static - 4.3-14ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: bash package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3-14ubuntu1.2').
